name: Sumak Kawsay Yachay
description:
Sumak Kawsay Yachay (SKY) is a community project in the indigenous Andean village of Salasaka, Ecuador. The name is in Kichwa and means "Beautiful Life by Education". It is a program where children and adults are supported in their education and taught basic subjects including English. Our work is possible thanks to our volunteers and private donations from all over the world.

http://katitawa.blogspot.com/p/volunteer-opportunities.html
